long_description: Enjoy your backpacking meals to the max with the strong and lightweight Sea To Summit Delta bowl. Food-grade nylon has a high melting point and is strong and rigid. Innovative hex pattern base reduces overall weight and helps keep the bowl cool to the touch when eating hot foods. Thumb grip on side of bowl keeps your fingers out of your food; grip doubles as a hanging loop. Steep side walls keep food and liquids from slopping over the edge. Measurement increments on the inside help you prepare meals and portion food.
short_description: Enjoy your backpacking meals to the max with the strong and lightweight Sea To Summit Delta bowl.
